title: Carucci: Harvin May Retire

LONDON, ENGLAND-Buffalo News Bills beat writer Vic Carucci tells Channel 2 sports director Adam Benigni that wide receiver Vic Carucci Tells Adam Benigni Percy Harvin May Retire WGRZ 
Percy Harvin is contemplating calling it a career. 
Carucci appears with Adam every week during the NFL season to discuss the Bills. Read or Share this story: http://on.wgrz.com/1S07Q6v More Stories
